60 
61  struct Code
62  {
63  enum CodeEnum
64  {
65  OK = 0,
66  NOT_INITIALIZED = 0x0605,
67  NOT_FOUND = 0x0019,
68  CANNOT_OPEN_FILE = 0x0006,
69  NO_MORE_ITEM = 0x0015,
70  NOT_CONNECTED = 0x0017,
71  STATE_ERROR = 0x001c,
72  THREAD_ERROR = 0x001d,
73  INVALID_DATA_FORMAT = 0x0501,
74  ABORTED = 0x0001,
75  NOT_ENOUGH_MEMORY = 0x0018,
76  GENERIC_ERROR = 0x4000,
77  INVALID_PARAMETER = 0x4001,
78  CANCEL = 0x4002,
79  PENDING = 0xffff,
80  TIMEOUT = 0x001e,
81  NO_LICENSE = 0x0602,
82  GENICAM_XML_ERROR = 0x0904,
83  NOT_IMPLEMENTED = 0x0604,
84  NOT_SUPPORTED = 0x001a,
85  FILE_ERROR = 0x0010,
86  ERR_OVERFLOW = 0x001b,
87  IMAGE_ERROR = 0x0025,
88  MISSING_PACKETS = 0x0027,
89  BUFFER_TOO_SMALL = 0x0004,
90  TOO_MANY_RESENDS = 0x0b00,
91  RESENDS_FAILURE = 0x0b01,
92  TOO_MANY_CONSECUTIVE_RESENDS = 0x0b03,
93  AUTO_ABORTED = 0x0b02,
94  BAD_VERSION = 0x0201,
95  NO_MORE_ENTRY = 0x0603,
96  NO_AVAILABLE_DATA = 0x0014,
97  NETWORK_ERROR = 0x0013,
98  RESYNC = 0x0028,
99  BUSY = 0x0202
100  };
101  };
102 
103 private:
104 
105  uint32_t mCode;
106  uint32_t mInternalCode;
107  uint32_t mOSCode;
108  PvString* mDescription;
109 
110 };
